00034 #define STR_NONSYNTH "!"
00035 
00037 #define STR_CTRLB2_25   "CAGCAGTTCTACGATGGCAAGTCCT"
00038 
00040 #define STR_CTRLB2_21   "GCAGTTCTACGATGGCAAGTC"
00041 
00043 #define STR_EXTENDB2_11 "CCGTTCAGCAGTACTACGATGGCAA"
00044 
00046 #define STR_CTRLB1_25   "AGGACTTGCCATCGTAGAACTGCTG"
00047 
00049 #define STR_CTRLB1_21   "GACTTGCCATCGTAGAACTGC"
00050 
00052 #define STR_EXTENDB2_QUALIFIER  "extend948"
00053 
00055 #define STR_EXTENDB2_PROBE_LENGTH 24
00056

00076 void CGRCFileWriter::PopulateData(const C1LQFileData &libData) {

00080 /* 
00081  * Sets the B1 probe at the given index.
00082  */
00083 void CGRCFileWriter::SetB1(int index, int x, int y)
00084 {
00085         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00086         coord.x = x;
00087         coord.y = y;
00088         if (index < m_Grid.GetNumB1Probes())
00089                 m_Grid.SetB1(index, coord);
00090 }
00091

00098         coord.x = x;
00099         coord.y = y;
00100         if (index < m_Grid.GetNumB2Probes())
00101                 m_Grid.SetB2(index, coord);

00112         if (index < m_Grid.GetNumNSProbes())

00116 /*
00117  * Extract the data from the 1LQ file.
00118  * If shift mask design then 
00119  *      put the extended B2's in the B1 bin.
00120  */
00121 void CGRCFileWriter::ParseLibData(const C1LQFileData &libData)
00122 {
00123         m_Grid.Clear();
00124 
00125         m_Grid.SetColumns(libData.GetNumberColumns());
00126         m_Grid.SetRows(libData.GetNumberRows());
00127 
00128         int nNS=0;
00129         int nB1=0;
00130         int nB2=0;
00131         bool bShiftMask=false;
00132         const list<DataEntry> &entries = libData.GetEntries();
00133 
00134 
00135         // Determine if shift mask design.
00136         for (list<DataEntry>::const_iterator it = entries.begin(); bShiftMask == false && it != entries.end(); it++)
00137         {
00138                 DataEntry entry = *it;
00139                 if ( entry.probe == STR_EXTENDB2_11 ||
00140                         (entry.qualifier == STR_EXTENDB2_QUALIFIER && entry.plength == STR_EXTENDB2_PROBE_LENGTH))
00141                         bShiftMask = true;
00142         }
00143 
00144 
00145         // Count the number of probes in each bin.
00146         for (list<DataEntry>::const_iterator it = entries.begin(); it != entries.end(); it++)
00147         {
00148                 DataEntry entry = *it;
00149 
00150                 // Increment the counters for the non-synth probes.
00151                 if(entry.probe == STR_NONSYNTH)
00152                 {
00153                         nNS++;
00154                 }
00155 
00156                 // Increment B2 if shift mask B2 probe.
00157                 else if (bShiftMask == true && (entry.qualifier == STR_EXTENDB2_QUALIFIER && entry.plength == STR_EXTENDB2_PROBE_LENGTH))
00158                 {
00159                         nB2++;
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 // Increment B1 bin if shift mask ext B2 probe.
00163                 else if (bShiftMask == true && entry.probe == STR_EXTENDB2_11)
00164                 {
00165                         nB1++;
00166                 }
00167 
00168                 // Increment B2 bin if B2 probe.
00169                 else if (entry.probe == STR_CTRLB2_25 || entry.probe == STR_CTRLB2_21)
00170                 {
00171                         nB2++;
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 // Increment B1 bin if checkerboard design and B1 probe.
00175                 else if (bShiftMask == false && (entry.probe == STR_CTRLB1_25 || entry.probe == STR_CTRLB1_21))
00176                 {
00177                         nB1++;
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 
00181         // Allocate memory for the arrays
00182         m_Grid.ResizeB1(nB1);
00183         m_Grid.ResizeB2(nB2);
00184         m_Grid.ResizeNS(nNS);
00185 
00186         // Extract the coordinates from the 1LQ data.
00187         int indexB1=0;
00188         int indexB2=0;
00189         int indexns=0;
00190         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00191         for (list<DataEntry>::const_iterator it = entries.begin(); it != entries.end(); it++)
00192         {
00193                 DataEntry entry = *it;
00194 
00195                 // Store the coordinates.
00196                 if(entry.probe == STR_NONSYNTH)
00197                 {       
00198                         coord.x = entry.x;
00199                         coord.y = entry.y;
00200                         m_Grid.SetNS(indexns, coord);
00201                         ++indexns;
00202                 }
00203                 else if (bShiftMask == true && (entry.qualifier == STR_EXTENDB2_QUALIFIER) && (entry.plength == STR_EXTENDB2_PROBE_LENGTH))
00204                 {
00205                         coord.x = entry.x;
00206                         coord.y = entry.y;
00207                         m_Grid.SetB2(indexB2, coord);
00208                         ++indexB2;
00209                 }
00210                 else if (bShiftMask == true && entry.probe == STR_EXTENDB2_11)
00211                 {
00212                         coord.x = entry.x;
00213                         coord.y = entry.y;
00214                         m_Grid.SetB1(indexB1, coord);
00215                         ++indexB1;
00216                 }
00217                 else if (entry.probe == STR_CTRLB2_25 || entry.probe == STR_CTRLB2_21)
00218                 {
00219                         coord.x = entry.x;
00220                         coord.y = entry.y;
00221                         m_Grid.SetB2(indexB2, coord);
00222                         ++indexB2;
00223                 }
00224                 else if (bShiftMask == false && (entry.probe == STR_CTRLB1_25 || entry.probe == STR_CTRLB1_21))
00225                 {
00226                         coord.x = entry.x;
00227                         coord.y = entry.y;
00228                         m_Grid.SetB1(indexB1, coord);
00229                         ++indexB1;
00230                 }
00231         }
00232 }

00234 /*
00235  * Extract the data from the 1LQ file and write the GRC file
00236  */
00237 bool CGRCFileWriter::Write(const C1LQFileData &libData, bool opposite /* = false */)
00238 {
00239         ParseLibData(libData);
00240         return WriteFile(opposite);
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*
00244  * write the data to a GRC file
00245  */
00246 bool CGRCFileWriter::Write(bool opposite /* = false */)
00247 {
00248         return WriteFile(opposite);
00249 }
00250 
00251 /*
00252  * Write the GRC file
00253  * If not opposite, print B2 first, then B1
00254  * Otherwise, print B1 first, then B2
00255  */
00256 bool CGRCFileWriter::WriteFile(bool opposite /* = false */)
00257 {
00258         // Open the grc file.
00259         ofstream grc(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary);
00260         if (!grc)
00261         {
00262                 return false;
00263         }
00264 
00265         // Write the magic/version
00266         uint8_t ver=GRC_VERSION;
00267         uint8_t magic=GRC_MAGIC;
00268         WriteUInt8(grc, magic);
00269         WriteUInt8(grc, ver);
00270 
00271         // Write the counts.
00272         WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetColumns());
00273         WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetRows());
00274         if (!opposite) {
00275                 WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetNumB2Probes());
00276                 WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetNumB1Probes());
00277         } else {
00278                 WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetNumB1Probes());
00279                 WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetNumB2Probes());
00280         }
00281         WriteInt32_N(grc, m_Grid.GetNumNSProbes());
00282 
00283         // Write the coordinates.
00284         uint16_t sval;
00285         int n;
00286         if (!opposite) {
00287                 n=m_Grid.GetNumB2Probes();
00288                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00289                 {
00290                         sval = m_Grid.GetB2(i).x;
00291                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00292                         sval = m_Grid.GetB2(i).y;
00293                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00294                 }
00295                 
00296                 n=m_Grid.GetNumB1Probes();
00297                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00298                 {
00299                         sval = m_Grid.GetB1(i).x;
00300                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00301                         sval = m_Grid.GetB1(i).y;
00302                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00303                 }
00304         } else {                
00305                 n=m_Grid.GetNumB1Probes();
00306                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00307                 {
00308                         sval = m_Grid.GetB1(i).x;
00309                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00310                         sval = m_Grid.GetB1(i).y;
00311                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00312                 }
00313 
00314                 n=m_Grid.GetNumB2Probes();
00315                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00316                 {
00317                         sval = m_Grid.GetB2(i).x;
00318                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00319                         sval = m_Grid.GetB2(i).y;
00320                         WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00321                 }
00322         }
00323 
00324         n=m_Grid.GetNumNSProbes();
00325         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00326         {
00327                 sval = m_Grid.GetNS(i).x;
00328                 WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00329                 sval = m_Grid.GetNS(i).y;
00330                 WriteUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00331         }
00332 
00333         // Close and return status.
00334         grc.close();
00335         if (grc.fail())
00336         {
00337                 return false;
00338         }
00339         return true;
00340 }
